title: Manohari Chandbali Jhumka Earrings - Floral Cascade
materials: Base metal with rose-gold tone finish
White Rice Pearls (2.48-4) and cubic Zirconias (0.31-8D MQ)
features: This pair features a cascading floral motif, combining traditional Chandbali elements with a modern, whimsical design. It showcases the use of various precious stones like Emerald beads and pearls, arranged meticulously in a graduated, drop-style layout.
colors: with a touch of pink and light blue.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Suitable for evening wear.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary aesthetics. This jewelry makes the perfect statement. The detailed craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty.
